data_table.description: Sample ID, body site, analyte type, tumor status of sample, and study name variable of participants with or without breast or prostate cancer and involved in the "The Breast and Prostate Cancer Cohort Consortium (BPC3) GWAS of Aggressive Prostate Cancer and ER- Breast Cancer" project.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected [Blood, Buccal]
